metadata.name: UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDG)
metadata.description: A value from the top-level list of UN sustainable development goals (SDGs) (e.g. ‘1’)

1.name: Goal 1. End poverty in all its forms everywhere

2.name: Goal 2. End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture

3.name: Goal 3. Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages

4.name: Goal 4. Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

5.name: Goal 5. Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls

6.name: Goal 6. Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

7.name: Goal 7. Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all

8.name: Goal 8. Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all

9.name: Goal 9. Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation

10.name: Goal 10. Reduce inequality within and among countries

11.name: Goal 11. Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

12.name: Goal 12. Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

13.name: Goal 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

14.name: Goal 14. Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

15.name: Goal 15. Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

16.name: Goal 16. Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels

17.name: Goal 17. Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
